pipelines:add.description:
add this app to a pipeline
The app and pipeline names must be specified.
The stage of the app will be guessed based on its name if not specified.

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

stage.name: stage
stage.description: stage of first app in pipeline

pipelines:connect.description: connect a github repo to an existing pipeline

repo.name: repo
repo.description: the GitHub repository to connect to

pipelines:create.description:
'create a new pipeline
  An existing app must be specified as the first app in the pipeline.
  The pipeline name will be inferred from the app name if not specified.
  The stage of the app will be guessed based on its name if not specified.
  The pipeline owner will be the user creating the pipeline if not specified with -t for teams or -o for orgs.

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

stage.name: stage
stage.description: stage of first app in pipeline

team.name: team
team.description: the team which will own the apps

args.name: name
args.description: name of pipeline (defaults to basename of the app)

pipelines:diff.description: compares the latest release of this app to its downstream app(s)

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

pipelines.description: list pipelines you have access to

pipelines:info.description: show list of apps in a pipeline

args.name: pipeline
args.description: pipeline to show list of apps for

pipelines:promote.description: promote the latest release of this app to its downstream app(s)

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

to.name: to
to.description: comma separated list of apps to promote to

pipelines:remove.description: remove this app from its pipeline

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

pipelines:setup.description: bootstrap a new pipeline with common settings and create a production and staging app (requires a fully formed app.json in the repo)

team.name: team
team.description: the team to assign pipeline ownership to (defaults to current user)

yes.name: yes
yes.description: accept all default settings without prompting

args.name: repo
args.description: a GitHub repository to connect the pipeline to

args.name: owner
args.description: the owner to transfer the pipeline to

pipelines:update.description: update the app's stage in a pipeline

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

reviewapps:disable.description: disable review apps and/or settings on an existing pipeline

app.name: app
app.description: parent app used by review apps

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

reviewapps:enable.description: enable review apps and/or settings on an existing pipeline

app.name: app
app.description: parent app used by review apps

remote.name: remote
remote.description: git remote of app to use

wait-for-ci.name: wait-for-ci
wait-for-ci.description: wait for CI to pass before deploying
